English: The Purchase of Greenland
Greenland is geographically closer to Arcadia than to Mainland Scandinavia, Surely it should belong to us for a good price?
Conquest of Lusitania
In order to become the dominant power in the new world we must cut Gran Colombia down to size, quite literally
The Hispanic Beacon of Liberty
We are now ready to throw our doors open to the souls trying to find a better life in the New World
Integration of the Aimaras
Now we have secured the region, we can now begin to integrate the Aimara people into our society
Integration of Lotharingia
The Lotharins, long supporters of our nations, are now a part of our nation. We must ensure their rights are guaranteed for the foreseeable future
Integration of Amazonie
The people of Amazonie have been eager to embrace the ideas of Panamerigaism but struggled to accept it being under Beornia. However, they finally appear ready to embrace our Beornian ideals
Ending the Beornian Incursions
Beornia has decided to claim the Patagonians lands for their own. We should save the natives and claim the lands for our own!
Liberators of Afro-Amerigans
After securing Ameriga from Gran Colombia, our leader has decided we should liberate all former slaves from their oppressors!
Purchase of Trinidad
The Isle of Trinidad lies just a short distance away from Tobago, maybe we can convince Gran Colombia to sell it to us for a small price?
Purchase of Curacao and St. Jean
The Isles of Curacao and St. Jean are of no real significance to Burgundy, maybe they will part ways with them for a price?
Purchase of Bermuda

Despite it's strategic location, the Isle of Bermuda has caused the previous owner problems due to the superstitions surrounding the so-called Bermuda Triangle, maybe we can rid them of their problems for a small fee?
Masters of the Caribbean
Against all odds, we have united the Caribbean under New Courland! Whilst an impressive achievement, we could still do more though...
The Greater Austral Destiny
We now occupy all our nearby islands, it's now time to proclaim our greatest ambitions!
Treaty of Waitangi
Our Diplomats have managed to convince the Maori tribes to sign an unequal treaty. Let's act before they figure out how unequal it was!
Unite the Chinese Diasporas!
The former Chinese colonies have a lot in common, maybe we should strive to unite these states under one banner?
Chinese Diasporas United!
We have united the former colonies under one banner! May the future for all of us be prosperous
Our Place in the Sun
We should seek to claim and integrate the isles of the pacific into our country for it is our mare nostrum!
Purchase of Timor
The isles that compose the colony of Timor are likely of little strategic importance to the Europeans, maybe we could buy them in order to extend our reach into the Moluccas
Co-Operation with Qingqiu?

Whilst some of our hawkish advisors are advocating for Qingqiu's non-existence, some are suggesting we co-operate instead in order to gain a valuable ally in Arcadia instead. Let's trust the latter which will likely ease tensions between us and the rest of the world
Forward the Aragonese Claims!
Now that we have united the heartlands of Aragon under our control, we can now claim their possessions in Italy for ourselves!
Integrating Naples
We finally now have control over the Aragonese holdings in Italy! Let us now adopt their administration so we can integrate the locals into our Iberian Dream!
A New Capital?
With the wars with Gran Colombia now a distant memory, let us move our capital to better represent our nation. Question is where?
Re-establishing Genonan Dominance
Now we have recaptured Corsica, we should now look to regaining our control over the Mediterranean
§pRecreate the Kingdom of Arles§!.
We have managed to secure the historic heartlands of the kingdom of Arles, let us now reclaim that legacy!
Control over the Swiss
We have successfully subjugated Switzerland and now all we have left to do is integrate them into our society
Creation of the Arles Empire
All of the historic Arles land now lies under our direct authority, let us proclaim an empire and enter a new golden age!
Integration of Savoy

We have now consolidated our hold on Savoy for long enough that the people here are slowly accepting our rule! With a few enshrined rights for them in a constitutional amendment we can maybe bring them fully under the fold
Annexation of Geneva
We have conquered Geneva and it shall now form a core part of our territory!
Annexation of Genoa
We have conquered Genoa and it shall now form a core part of our territory!
Form Lombardy-Venetia
We now own both Milan and Venice, the two largest cities in northern Italy. With this we can proclaim the state of Lombardy-Venetia!
Securing the Po River
We have successfully taken control of the Italian city states of Modena and Parma, with this we can now project our power down the Po!
Form Venetia-Lombardy
We now own both Venice and Milan, the two largest cities in northern Italy. With this we can proclaim the state of Venetia-Lombardy!
Form a §GNorth Italian League§!.
We now dominate Northern Italy, we should now start thinking about forming a nation that caters for every Italian and unify our people under one flag
Unite Central Italy!
With central Italy now under our rule, we should now think about bringing the rest of Italy under our heel
Proclaim a §OLatin Empire§!!
We did what aragon could not and can now proclaim a Latin empire! Let us now make sure that all those lands are fully under our control
Proclaim an §GAdriatic Empire§!!
We have followed in Venice's footsteps and now control the Adriatic. We should continue to expand and control the Balkans and the Aegean sea as well!
The Anglois Dilemma
For years the English and French have been at odds with one another, we must now make a choice whether to side with one of them or embrace a new movement who are identifying themselves as Anglois
Integrating Brittany
The Bretons are a melting pot of French and Celtic and are a good first step in trying to embrace the wider Dual Monarch population
Integrating the Welsh
The Welsh are a melting pot of English and Celtic and are a good first step in trying to embrace the wider Dual Monarch population
Triumph of the Anglois
The Anglois dream of uniting French and English has come to fruition, now both groups consider themselves a part of the Dual Monarchy
Integrating Burgundy
The Burgundian lands have long been claimed by the French crown, now with the defeat of burgundy we can make these claims a reality
Integrating the Beornians
The Beornians have, for a long time, claimed the English throne and have been an annoyance. However we can now reconcile with these misguided pretenders and forge a new friendship!
Crisis over Savoie
Savoie is at the crossroads of Italian, French and Burgundian ambitions and as such all claim this strategic region part of their own country. We must make sure the region belongs to us at all costs!
Securing the isles of the Atlantic

Now we are in a dominant position over the British isles, it's time to make sure our navy has the ability to project power across the entire World and for that we will need ports in the Atlantic to refuel
Destroy the Beornians
The claim of Beornia to the English throne is outlandish and misguided. We must show them that only one nation can claim it and that shall be us!
Teaching the English Language

We have reached a point where influential figures in government now advocate for the English language to be the only official language in our nation. Let's embrace them and become a monocultural nation!
Becoming the §BKing of France§!!
We have finally answered our ancestor's claim to the French throne! Beware though our subjects in the north might not approve of our shift in direction...
Integrating the Anglois
The Anglois are devoted to the Dual Monarchy. However their French routes are deep also, if we can tap into that then we might be able to convince them of joining us. Viva la France!
Recreate the §pKingdom of Arles§!
We have managed to secure the historic heartlands of the kingdom of Arles, let us now reclaim that legacy!
Form §GThe Confederation of the Rhine§!

We have gained enough influence over the southern and western German states to proclaim a united Confederation. This will require a change in court however as many people are not happy with this sudden change of direction, both inside and outside our country...
Integration of the Danube
We can now look to integrate more Germans into our empire as we are now an established nation
Integrating the Irish
Now that we control all of Ireland, we should begin to focus on integrating the Irish into out nation
Integrating the Welsh
Now that we control all of Wales, we should begin to focus on integrating the Welsh into out nation
Integrating the Anglois
Now that our hold on the british isles has consolidated, we can focus on bringing the former rulers into the Scandinavian fold
Affirm §BDominance over the White Sea§!
We have confirmed our naval dominance in the White Sea and can now look into expanding further into Russia and Siberia
Claiming Arctic Arcadia
We shall try to return to our colonies in Arcadia and seek to control the elusive North-West Passage for our ships!
Claiming Siberia
We shall try to settle Siberia as we explore the potential of the North-East shipping route
§GReturn to Italy§!
Long ago, the Holy Roman Empire had a iron grasp on Italy. Now, we have recovered the lands beyond the Alps and with railroads can now secure the region once more!
§OSecuring the Rhine§!

The Netherlands, once a part of the Empire long ago and the gate between the Rhine and the sea, is now once again under control of the emperor. Let us secure the region so well known for it's sailors to create our own navy!
Control of the Rhine
We are now in a position to contest Burgundy for the control of the lower Rhine! Taking this will provide our nation with some of the finest ports in the World!
Integrate the Slovenes
Slovenia is a melting pot of Germanic, Italian and Balkan ideas and cultures. If we emphasise their Germanic connections then they might just accept our legitimate rule
Control of the Mountains
We have managed to secure the mountains of the Alps, a major strategic success due to their ease to defend and abundance of raw materials
Restore the Stem Duchy
We've united Baden and Wurttemberg under one flag! We should now focus on restoring the long lost idea of a united Swabia although it will be tricky
Form §BZapadoslavia!§!
We have united the West Slavic lands under one banner!
Integrate the Baltic States

The Baltic states have some cultural influences from Prussian and polish settlers and have lacked independent rule for a while, let's safeguard their heritage and provide them with an autonomy they haven't experienced since the Baltic crusades!
The §GRuthenian Commonwealth§!
The Ruthenians have struggled to find a country they can call home and are threatened by a resurgent Russia in the East. Let us protect the Ruthenians and stand with them against the Russian Bear!
The §RElbian Commonwealth§!

The Elbians have long influenced the West Slavic states which can be seen in the numerous settlements dotted across Poland and Bohemia. We can now fully bring the population on board and create a commonwealth that will protect them from any Scandinavian or Burgundian intervention in Germany
Integrating the Estonians

The Estonians are unique in the fact their language and culture has more similarities to Uralic, Finnish or even Hungarian than to Lithuanian. However, the geography of the Baltics means that some customs are shared and it will be these that we use to show the population that Estonians and Lithuanians are not that different after all
Taming the Pontic Steppes

The Crimeans have long mingled with polish Cossacks and hussars and Crimean horse breeds is still considered far superior to most other European breeds. Let us embrace their traditions and reconcile the Cossacks and the Crimeans!
Integrate the Armenians
The Armenians, a predominantly Christian ethnic group, have long wanted a Christian government to answer to. We are now in the position to answer that very call
Integrating the Kazakhs

The great Stepps of Central Asia are home to the Kazakh peoples, a nomadic group who have never really know what a stable government is. Through our Cossacks though we might be able to communicate with them and slowly integrate them into our society
Integrating the Crimeans

For a long time now, Ruthenian and Russian Settlers have been making the Pontic steppe their home. With this time they have managed to integrate their way of life with the Crimean way of life. Perhaps we can use this to assimilate the Crimeans into  our government?
Integrating the Lithuanians
The Lithuanians share many customs and ideals as the Latvians so it should be easy convincing the Lithuanians to join us once the Latvians have done so
Integrating the Prussians

Since the middle ages, Germans from the Hanseatic League set up trading posts across the Baltic and even at Neva, many of whom later settled and now refer to themselves as Prussians. Many of these German minorities have lived in peace with our settlers so getting them to accept our rule with some autonomy should be easy!
§gMaster of the Balkans§!
The Balkan Peninsular is of strategic importance for us to hold and is contested by the Ottomans and the Venetians. We must make moves before they do!
March to the Black Sea!
Now we have secured Serbia, we can now push towards the black sea as obtaining a port here will allow us to secure a safe harbour for a new navy
Marching to the Aegean!

Now that we have secured Serbia, we should now consider trying to remove the Venetian and Ottoman presence from the Balkans for good! Greece is a lynchpin in both of their ambitions so taking it will ruin any future expansion for them and provide us with the idyllic ports of the Aegean Sea!
Propose a §RDanubian Federation§!
Against all odds we have secured a strong position in southern Germany! We should seek to create a union of all the peoples of the Danube in order to project our power even further!
Following the Rivers
We have reached a point where we can now decide on a new focus for our country, whether it be consolidation or expanding past the Danube.
Integrate the Slovenes

The Slovenes are similar in language and culture to the Croats but have also adopted certain things from Italian and German Influences. With Croats already a integral part of our realm, lets add Hungarian to the Slovene melting pot shall we?
Integrate the Serbs

The differences between the Serbs and the Hungarians are very noticeable but what is also clear is the relief of not being under Ottoman rule anymore. Maybe with a little autonomy we can set aside our differences and start a new chapter?
Integrate the Albanians

The Albanians were not so long ago in a full-blown civil war against the Turks. Our liberation of them has obviously been greeted with great celebration on both sides and it seems likely that the Albanians will find great things to come as our new citizens!
Integrate the Bulgarians

The Bulgarians have long been forced to live in poor conditions under Ottoman rule but now with us guiding them things have improved... Well that's what we are telling them anyway! We have now reached a point though where many Bulgarians are now happy to call our country home
The Liberation of the Greeks

The Greeks, the descendants of the late Byzantine Empire, are once again experiencing somewhat independent rule, free from Venetian or Ottoman interference. We can now celebrate their liberation with a ceremony in Constantinople, the Hagia Sophia once again returning to it's role as a christian church and centrepiece for these celebrations
Integrating Montenegro
We now control Montenegro whose people are 100% Serbs through and through, it will be hard denying that Montenegro should be a core part of Serbia
Integrating the Serbians
For a long time now Albanians and Serbs have lived in harmony, we should continue this relationship in government
Integrating the Greeks
For a long time now Albanians have lived as a minority in Greece in relative peace, we should continue this relationship now as a majority
Integrating the Bulgarians
The balkan cultures should stick together, the outside threats are too severe!
§BIntegrating the Greeks§!
The Greeks and Bulgarians have lived in relative peace with each other in Macedonia for a long time, we should continue this in government although it will upset the Turks in our country...
§RIntegrating the Turks§!
The Bulgarians remained loyal to the old Turkish regime until it was no longer viable, this loyalty will surely shine through in government although aligning with the Turks will upset the Greeks...
Integrating the Albanians
The balkan cultures should stick together, the outside threats are too severe!
Integrating the Serbians

The Serbians and Bulgarians have crossed paths many times in Macedonia. We should be able to convince them to join our nation as long as we keep the Turks out of Europe! §RNOTE: This is mutually exclusive with the accepting Turkish decision§!
§YThe Romanian-Bulgarian Union!§!
Romanians and Bulgarians have many differences despite the lack of a geographic barrier. A union will require a lot of convincing of both peoples...
§BIntegrating the minorities§!
Romania has many minorities living here with Ruthenians, Germans, and Hungarians just to name a few. We should start reforming our country in order to better represent them
Dominance in the Balkans
The balkans are fractured and vulnerable to outside threats. We should Consolidate the region in order to safeguard the people there
Integrating the Greeks
The greeks are perhaps the closest culturally to us Romanians, they should be a good start in order to integrate the rest of the Balkans
Integrating Serbia
The balkan cultures should stick together, the outside threats are too severe!
Integrating Albania
The balkan cultures should stick together, the outside threats are too severe!
Uniting Carpathia
The Carpathian Region is now fully under our control, we should now proclaim a new government in order to address the regions many linguistic differences
The Moldavian March
Moldavia has, for a long time, been under the polish influence. We should look to integrate them in order to secure a black sea port and protect our borders with Hungary more
§pReform the Greater Jagiellonian Union!§!

The Jagiellonian Union was a union that composed of, at different time periods, the nations of Hungary, Poland, Slovakia, Bohemia and Lithuania under one dynasty. Whilst the Polish-Lithuanian Union continues it's legacy, a greater union is a distant memory. But now we can revive this memory into a modern union!
§pReform the Lesser Jagiellonian Union!§!

The Jagiellonian Union was a union that composed of, at different time periods, the nations of Hungary, Poland, Slovakia, Bohemia and Lithuania under one dynasty. Whilst the Polish-Lithuanian Union continues it's legacy, a greater union is a distant memory. But for now we can revive this memory into a modern union between the polish, Slovak and Hungarian people!
Integrating the Romanians

The Romanian population have been ruled over directly and indirectly over the past centuries by both Hungarian and Polish Kings. By fabricating history texts that declare this to be a golden age of Romanian arts, literature and prosperity we can once again bring the people on board!
§RPushing East!§!
Now that we have reformed Byzantium, we should focus on restoring it's eastern borders in order to bring civilization to the people of the near east
Reclaiming Egypt
By using the plight of the Coptic Christians and it's strategic position, we can justify a war to reclaim Egypt back for the basileus!
§BPushing West§!
Now that we have reformed Byzantium, we should focus on restoring it's western borders in order to protect the people of the Balkans from outside intervention
Return to Italy
Now that we have secured the Balkans, we can now focus on getting a foothold in Italy and return Byzantine rule to Naples!
§RAlexander's Ambition§!
Alexander the great invaded Persia and created an empire spanning from Greece to the edges of India. We shall now set out to do the same!
Beyond the Indus
Alexander's conquests stopped at the Indus River, ours don't have to though and our technology is vastly superior. India won't be the end of the empire, it will be the start of ours!
Conquering Egypt
Egypt is an important location both in ancient and modern times. We should secure the region in order to secure our empire!
Liberation of the Eastern Christians

The Christian population east of Constantinople has been under constant pressure to accept and convert to their overlord's beliefs. We can now offer them respite from this and a nation that they can safely call home!
Accepting the Kurds
The Kurdish population are in an unusual position, being majority Islamic but still prosecuted by Iraqis, Turks and Persians for ages. Maybe we can offer them a brighter future?
§BReform into Greece§!
Whilst remaining Macedonia in order to fulfil Alexander's legacy is good, declaring us the next Greek state will grant us more legitimacy and still lets us do Alexander's legacy justice
Claiming Venice
Venice is a natural expansion route for Yugoslavia and the people here have long settled in the Balkans for the purpose of trade so integrating their customs into our society shall be easy
The Aftermath of the Ottoman Civil War

The sultanate survives and the Kurds are crushed but the Balkans and Egypt are lost. With the anger still evident through society, we must decide on what course to take in order to rebuild and restore our nation to it's former glory if at all possible!
Restoring rule to Bulgaria
The Bulgarians are an obvious first step in re-securing our position in the Balkans. We should start making plans in order to invade them
Restoring rule to Greece

Greece is a key part in what made the Ottomans such a strong power in Europe for centuries, we need to restore our rule over the region in order to once again be taken seriously by other European powers
Restoring rule to Wallachia
Wallachia has always been an issue, it's people disloyal and it's position south of the Danube making it hard to secure. However, this time we will secure it once and for all!
Restoring rule to Albania

The Albanians are an odd case, fighting for independence but also adopting our customs more readily compared to other Balkan cultures. Nevertheless we must re-secure the region in order to gain ports in the Adriatic sea to challenge Venice
Restoring rule to Serbia
The Serbians have always been rebellious towards anyone who wanted to occupy them. This time however we will secure the region and ensure loyalty to the Sultan is maintained at all cost...
Restoring rule to Croatia
Croatia was the boundary for the Ottoman empire in it's heyday, returning to this territory will definitely put us back on the map!
Restoring rule to Hungary

Hungary was the boundary for the Ottoman empire in it's heyday with it's position bordering the now defunct Holy Roman Empire a statement of defiance against Christian powers ,returning to this territory will definitely put us back on the map!
Restoring rule to Egypt
Egypt was the Ottoman Breadbasket and it shall be once again! It's position at a narrow stretch of land between the Red and Mediterranean seas also could provide some use later on...
Restoring rule to Arabia

Arabia and the holy cities of Medina and Mecca have been a source of legitimacy for the Ottoman Empire for ages. Restoring our rule over these lands will once again give us the prestige in the eyes of the Muslim world!
Restoring rule to Mesopotamia
Iraq broke free from Ottoman rule and is now seeking to carve out it's own path in Persia or the Levant. We must end these ambitions prematurely...
First Ottoman-Arabian Reforms
The Turkish culture, despite what outsiders may first think, has many differences compared to the cultures of the Arabian Peninsular. Closing the gaps between them will take time...
Second Ottoman-Arabian Reforms

The first series of reforms have been successful in integrating the Turkish culture with the cultures of the Arabic World, let us continue then and embrace the peoples of Egypt and North Africa as well!
Invasion into the Safavids
Our Adisors have a mad ambition to create a pan-Turkic state. Their first plan is to invade the Safavids in order to reconnect with our people in Azerbaijan and get access to the steppes of Tatarstan
Invasion of Tatarstan
Now that we have secured the Caucasian mountains, we can push into the European steppes and liberate the Turkic people there!
Declration of the State of Turania

Somehow the mad dream of uniting the Turkic people of the world is coming true! We have decided to declare the nation of Turania now in order to build support in the Turkic regions ready for our liberation to reach them!
§GEgyptian Arabia§!

The collapse of the Ottoman power over the Arabian Peninsular has left a power vacuum which we can now fill! We also have the benefit of being more relatable to the Arabs than the foreign Turks ever were!
Liberate the Maghreb?
The Maghreb Region has been held under Iberian rule for a long time but now maybe we can reverse their fortunes and restore local rule over these areas?
Reclaim the Eastern Steppes
We should seek to unite with our kin in the steppes to our East!
Rebuilding the Tatar Yoke
We must follow our ancient ancestors west to liberate the Tatars from European imperialism!
Reclaiming the Timur Legacy
Timur and his descendants once ruled over Persia for a long and prosperous period and before them were the Ilkhanate. Let us restore their legacies once more
Claiming Greater Burma
Now we have restored our core territory, it's time to expand further into the decaying Khmer Empire and Bengali Sultanate
The Second Taungoo Empire
We have now proven to be the dominant power in the region and have restored the glory of the Taungoo dynasty!
Subjugation of Khmer
We have restored Thai rule over the majority of the Thai pops in the decaying Khmer Empire, we must now lay to rest the relic of an empire
Hegemony over Indochina
We are now in a unopposed position to cement our rule over the rest of the Indochinese Peninsular!
The Traders of Malacca

Over long periods of time, thanks to it's geographical position, Malacca has harboured many Chinese and Malay traders who have called the Peninsular their home. We should establish more freedoms for these people as their trade and cooperation is profitable for both them and the state
The Second Golden age of Khmer!
We have restored our rule not just across our former lands but also across the entirety of Indochina! This is truly a second golden age!
Cham Expansionism

Our peoples have managed to survive against all odds against numerous states and empires. The struggle isn't over yet though and if we can ride out the storm once more then maybe we can forge a new empire in the region?
Hegemony over Indochina
We are now in a unopposed position to cement our rule over the rest of the Indochinese Peninsular!
Control over Malaya
With a foothold in Brunei, we can now look to extend our rule across the rest of the archipelago and forge a new maritime empire!
Conquest of Champa
Champa is the weakest state in the Indochinese region and is the first strike for Khmer in their effort to restore their rule over the region. We will need to 'protect' them!
Hegemony over Indochina
We are now in a unopposed position to cement our rule over the rest of the Indochinese Peninsular!
Defy the Dragon!
China is embroiled in civil unrest and war, we shall use this to our advantage and open up the backdoor into China!
Becoming the Dragon
We have, somehow, united China under one rule again but this time from Hanoi. Let us restore the Dragon throne and become the leaders of a new, unified China!
Invading Manchuria
Now the dust has settled with our war with Japan, we should seek to expand our borders North to the Amur
Claim Ainu
The Ainu lands in Siberia are rich in resources, we should take this from under Japan's nose
Breakthough the Island Chain
Our Naval Capacity is being contained and restricted by Japan's control of islands around us, we must break this if we want to be relevant on the global stage
Form China
We have finally finished the Civil war and united China once again!
Form China
We have finally finished the Civil war and united China once again!
Form China
We have destroyed the renegade states of China and the dragon throne is empty. Maybe it's time for a new Korean Chinese dynasty?
Restoration of Yuan
We should claim our predecessor's former lands to truly claim their legitimacy!
Restoration of Qing
Now the dust has settled and the civil war now behind us, we should reclaim our former borders and return to our golden age!
Establishment of the Taiping Kingdom
Now the dust has settled and the civil war now behind us, we should set our stance and claims in the region and assert our Hegemony over Asia
Claiming the South China Sea
It is clear that modern world powers need a strong navy. Therefore we must assert our authority over the entirety of the South China Sea
Demand colonial submission
Now with China restored, we should assert ourselves over our former renegade colonies
Establishing Trung Quoc
With Vietnamese control over China now solidified, we should set our stance and claims in the region and assert our Hegemony over Asia
The Dragon Sat atop of the Roof
With Tibetan control over China now solidified, we should set our stance and claims in the region and assert our Hegemony over Asia
Decending from the Heavens
The Bengal Region of India is important due to it's fertile grounds, large population and confluence of 3 major rivers. We must secure to secure the Tibetan Plateau
Establishing Jung Gug
With Korean control over China now solidified, we should set our stance and claims in the region and assert our Hegemony over Asia
The Sunrise Invasion
For Centuries, Japan has plagued Korea and China with invasions and piracy. This will now all come to an end now...
§YClaim Manchuria§!
Manchuria is of strategic importance for any future mainland incursion. The army is in full support of a full-on Invasion which should be swift thanks to China's disarray...
The Marco Polo Bridge

We are at the gates of Beijing, controlling the city and surrounding area would be a huge prestige bonus and provide a new palace for the emperor although it could be viewed negatively by the European Powers...
The Fall of China
Our commanders have drawn up plans to proceed with a full-scale Invasion and Annexation of China. This would be a huge achievement for the Japanese Empire but could risk international relations...
The Asian Superpower
We are now considered in the eyes of the world as the world's greatest power. With that we could approach our Chinese subjects to show how well off they are being in the Japanese empire
Invade Taiwan
Taiwan is isolated from china by sea and it's owner is weakened by the ongoing conflicts in mainland china. We should seize the opportunity and integrate it into our empire!
§RStrike South!§!
The Islands that lie south of Taiwan are rich in resources and should be an easy way to show off our modernised navy and finally prove that we can stand toe-to-toe with the European powers!
The East Asian Sphere
Now with Christinia now under Japanese administration, we should continue south and strike the remaining European colonisers in the Indonesian Islands and liberate the natives of the area!
Invasion of Austral
The Chinese renegade state of Zhouauo should be considered a part of our greater East Asian sphere. We must make sure this is the case though all means necessary.
Unite the Malays!
We have united our local region and our leaders now seek to expand our influence across more of the Indonesian archipelago
Unite Sumatra!
We have united our island and now our leaders seek to expand our influence across more of the Indonesian archipelago
Unite Borneo!
We have united our island and our leaders now seek to expand our influence across more of the Indonesian archipelago
Unite Java!
We have united our island and our leaders now seek to expand our influence across more of the Indonesian archipelago
Unite the Moluccas!
We have united our islands and our leaders now seek to expand our influence across more of the Indonesian archipelago
Unite the Filipinos!
We have united the Philippines under our rule and now our leaders look to expand our influence across more of the Indonesian archipelago
Form Nusantara
We have united enough islands to claim the legacy of the old empires that once ruled over these islands centuries ago!
The Long Ride West
We are descendants of the Kubai Khan himself and to do his legacy justice we must unify the steppes to our west and once again become the scourge of Europe
Re-integrating the Dutch
The dutch populace was alienated when we declared the kingdom of France, however time has passed now and they are willing to be reintegrated into our country
Assimilating the Incas
The nation of the Incas is destroyed, lost to time and the people lack leadership. This is a good time to assimilate the Incan subjects into our own realm
Restore the Mali Empire
We have managed to recover much of the historic lands of the Malian Empire, we should proclaim ourselves to be it's successor!
Restore the Mali Empire
We have managed to recover much of the historic lands of the Malian Empire, we should proclaim ourselves to be it's successor!
Recovery of the Treaty Ports
The Europeans drove us from the coast in order to setup the infamous triangle trade, we should seek their return to us as compensation
Conquest of Dahomey
We have subjugated our neighbour and can now claim this land to be rightfully ours!
Consolidation of the Niger Delta
We have consolidated control over the Niger Delta, an area rich in resources. We need to act fast though before word of this land reaches elsewhere!
Securing the coast
We have conquered our neighbours and secured the coastline which will provide us with plenty of resources!
Invasion of Kanem Bornu
Kanem Bornu has existed as a state for millennium but now it's time to incorporate them into our new empire!
Uniting Sudan!
We have now united the Kingdoms of Darfur and Funj into one country and can now look towards securing the rest of the upper Nile!
Advancing along the Nile
We should now seek to claim the south of egypt in order to secure the Nile and the food it provides
Invasion of Abyssinia
In order to secure a coastline with more viable ports, we have invaded Eritrea and should now seek to crush the remains of Abyssinia in order to secure our rule in the region
Securing the Horn of Africa

The Horn of Africa is of vital importance to shipping, especially due to rumours of a new canal being considered to connect the Red Sea and the Mediterranean. We should secure it if we want to have influence over shipping
Invade Nubia
The Nubians have been oppressed by the sudanese and it is up to us to liberate them!
Liberation of Coptic Christians
The Coptics have been suppressed in Egypt for too long, we must liberate them!
Claim the Upper Nile Basin
The peoples of the upper Nile are largely pastoral and unorganised but share some common cultural beliefs with us, we should use this as our claim to the region!
Securing the coast
We have secured the coast which will allow us to do business with Europeans on more balanced terms
Secuing the Hinterlands
The Rainforests of the Kongo must be tamed in order to establish ourselves as a regional power
The Greater Kongolese Ambition
With Europeans scrambling to get colonies, we must claim beyond our core lands in order to secure the survival of our peoples
Conquer Mongo
Mongo is the gateway into the Kongolese basin and as such we must establish rule over them to secure our country's interest
The Rift Valley
The Rift Valley is full of valuable resources thanks to it's geology. We must secure this in order to bankroll our economy
The Greater Azande Ambition
With Europeans scrambling to get colonies, we must claim beyond our core lands in order to secure the survival of our peoples
Controlling Lake Ukerewe
Lake Ukerewe is the lifeblood of people and as such we must make sure that we are the ones who control it
Securing our Eastern Border
Our eastern flank has many people who would like to take control of the rich resources that our kingdom is home to. We should secure this to halt their ambitions and liberate our peoples from them
Dominance over West Africa
With Europeans scrambling to get colonies, we must claim beyond our core lands in order to secure the survival of our peoples
Unite the Sub-Kongolese Savannah
The Tribes of the area are finally united under one ruler, let this be a first step towards a new empire!
Invasion of Kongo
We should invade the Kongo in order to remove our northern threats
Invasion of the Shona
The Shona should be subjugated in order to secure our southern border against the advancing Boer settlers
Conquer Kazembe
We have to conquest our Northern neighbours in order to secure more land and resources for our fight against the Boers!
Seize Mozambique
Through shrewd negotiation or maybe guerrilla warfare, we have obtained the Mozambique for our nation!
Uniting the local tribes
We have united the local tribes into one nation which we can use to hold against the Boers
Integrate the Sothos and Tswanas
These tribes to our north are share many things with our culture and traditions and are also struggling against the Boers, let us unite against our common enemy!
Integration of the Baastards
Now we have adopted western reforms and tactics, the Baastards are more willing to work with our government!
Integration of the Crimeans
With Greater Romania Established and our core minorities integrated, we now should start to integrate the newest minorities into our country as well
The Final Tanzimat Reforms

The Tanzimat, meaning reorganization of the Ottoman Empire, was a period of reformation that was characterized by various attempts to modernize the Ottoman Empire, to secure its territorial integrity against nationalist movements and aggressive powers. The reforms encouraged Ottomanism among the diverse ethnic groups of the Empire, attempting to stem the tide of nationalist movements within the Ottoman Empire. The reforms attempted to integrate non-Muslims and non-Turks more thoroughly into Ottoman society by enhancing their civil liberties and granting them equality throughout the Empire.
§R Return to Scandinavia§!
It is time for us return to our roots in Scandinavia after the government there has been proven unable to provide for the people there
§O Returning to the Old Belgium§!
The Flemish has been second class citizens to the Burgundians for too long, we shall now establish a Republic in the lowlands compromising of the people who live in the lowlands.
§p Formation of the Triple Monarchy§!

Ever since our first king, we have always held a claim to the dual throne, however with our foothold established in Europe we can now claim legitimately that we are the true heirs to a new, triple crown although what's left of the previous administration may now seek claims on our throne in Arcadia
§RNorthern Manifest Destiny§!
We should embrace the original Arcadian vision and seek to integrate the Vinlanders into our nation
§BWestern Manifest Destiny§!
In order to be a true global power we should integrate the nation of Qingqiu in order to project power across two Oceans
§OCentral Manifest Destiny§!
We should embrace the original Arcadian vision and seek to integrate the Plantagenians into our nation
§GSouthern Manifest Desitny§!

Gran Colombia has been a thorn in our side trying to prevent the unification of Arcadia in some format. However we have now united and we should march south to end the Gran Colombian menace for once and for all!
§ORestore Control over the Boer Colonies§!

The Boer states are breakaway colonies that believe the state was ignoring their needs and was neglecting the Dutch and Flemish people. This is fake news and we should mount an expedition to regain control of our former colonies in South Africa
Union of the Dutch and the Flemish peoples
We should seek to create a state that encompasses the entire peoples of the Dutch and Flemish who live in Europe, Arcadia and South Africa
The Greater Aragonese claims
We need to liberate the minority Catalonians in Spain in order to establish a larger buffer zone
Abandoning Britain

We can no longer hold the British isles or have any prospect of reclaiming them. It has been proposed that we should abandon our claims to the english lands and instead focus on restoring a French Kingdom
Abandoning France

We can no longer hold the French lands or have any prospect of reclaiming them. It has been proposed that we should abandon our claims to the French lands and instead focus on restoring a British Kingdom
Integration of the Former Slaves

We have abolished slavery, but the former slaves continue to be excluded from society. We would have everything to gain by making them full citizens, ensuring their prosperity and our national cohesion.
Form the North Sea Empire!
The North Sea Empire was a personal union between Scandinavia and England in the 11th century. A lot of time has passed now but we are now going to proclaim this empire once more!
§BForm the Baltic Empire§!

An Empire stretching across the entire Baltic sea has been envisioned by some with the sea being linked through the Vikings, the Hansa and the Teutons but now it's all unified under us! §R(NOTE: If we ever lose Scotland after taking this decision, we will lose cores and accepted on it!)§!
Conquest of Finland

Finland is a large territory which, under Scandinavia, allowed them to constrict trade between us and the rest of the world through the Gulf of Finland and the White Sea. Securing Finland now allows us to control our trade more
Conquest of Livonia

Livonia has two strategic purposes. One is the control of the Gulf of Finland for our trade and two is for the old Hanseatic city of Riga which controls the mouth of the Daugava River. By securing this we can make sure our trade continues to flow into the Baltic unimpeeded
§BForm the Baltic Empire§!
An Empire stretching across the entire Baltic sea has been envisioned by some with the sea being linked through the Vikings, the Hansa and the Teutons but now it's all unified under us!
Our Claim to Third Rome!

The Byzantines were the last remnants of the Roman Empire until their conquest by the Ottomans. We shall now claim to be their successors and use it to claim protection of the Christians in Anatolia. We shall also claim Constantinople for our own and restore it to glory!
Integration of the Dutch

Since our return, the remains of the Burgundian crown have started to treat the Dutch people with suspicion that they might try to rebel and have cracked down harshly. Let us embrace them into our new republic!
Integration of Bohemia
The Bohemian People are closely related to the german people thanks to Bohemia's ties to the Holy Roman Empire. Perhaps we can reintegrate these people into a Greater Germany!
Integration of the Lowlands
The Dutch People have felt a bit outcast by the dominance of the Burgundians. With their linguistic ties to Germanic, maybe we can merge them into a greater Germany?
Secure the Messippi
The Messippi is the lifeline of the great plains to our north. Controlling this will give us a strategic and economical dominance over that region
Dominance over Arcadia
With our nation now stretching from Saint Eleanor to Porto Novo, we can proclaim ourselves the hegemon of Arcadia
Conquest of Qingqiu
With the main cities under our control, we can proclaim our dominance over Qingqiu and set about establishing a permanent regime
Conquest of Kita Kaigan
Kita Kaigan, a now former Japanese colony, has many resources which we can use to our advantage. We shall set about establishing firm control over the region to make the most of these resources
Securing Guiana
Guiana is a vulnerable italian colony situated between us and Amazonie. We should quickly seize it to secure our position against the Amazonians
Securing the Amazon
The Amazon is vastly unexplored and has many resources. We should secure the entrance to the rainforest in order to have a future monopoly over it
Dominance over Ameriga
With the Fall of Port Liberte and Port Sucre, we now span across the entire longitude of the continent at it's widest point. We have therefore established complete dominance over the continent
End of the Incas
The Incas have finally fallen. With this the main threat to Gran Colombia in Ameriga is now extinct and we can now look towards re-educating these people
Integration of the Apache and the Amazonians

The natives of the Apache and the Amazon are few in number but by approaching them with increased autonomy and guaranteed rights we can, at the very least, create a country for them which they can get on with their lives in
Integration of the Mesoamericans
The Mesoamericans have not had an independent country since their conquest over 300 years ago. Now by accepting their customs and granting them rights we can integrate them into our nation
Purchase Guiana
The Italian colony of Guiana is not worth much to them especially with the turmoil in Europe. Let us make them an offer they cannot refuse
Accepting the Guianans
The Guianans need to be integrated into our nation after their sell out by their previous owner
Saving the Guarani
The Guarani are being forced from their land by advancing settlers from Beornia and Lotharingia. Let us integrate them and reclaim their rightful land!
Saving the Amazonian Natives
The Amazonian Natives are being forced from their land by advancing settlers from Gran Colombia and Amazonie. Let us integrate them and reclaim their rightful land!
Land for the First Peoples

We have now secured the rights of every first people in Ameriga but why stop there? Other Natives in Arcadia are crying out for someone to save them and we must take up this cause and be the true nation for the first peoples!
Protecting the People of Oceania

Out in the Ocean, there are many more independent people who are coming into first contact with imperialistic powers. We should seek to protect them in order to spare them the fate that almost became of us...
§BUp the Nile§!

While many in our nation see our future in the middle east, the Turks have proven themselves too difficult a target to dislodge. We should refocus our efforts on securing the Nile river as a viable route of expansion.
Conquer The Horn of Africa

The Horn of Africa is responsible for part of the Nile's flow as well as being an important shipping route. All we need do is tolerate their god as we have done with the Coptics for many years now and they will make fine new citizens.
The Source of the Nile

Explores have finaly been able to contact the tribes inhabiting the lake from which the Nile flows. We cannot afford any other nation having control of Lake Ukerewe so we should bring the neighbouring tribes into our empire.
§YDefy the Turks§

Although the Arab peninsula is now open for a righteous conquest our nation will never be safe as long as the Ottomans are on our doorstep. We should focus our efforts on pushing them far away from our homeland of Egypt.
Embrace the Turk's Minorities
We were not the only people to labor under the sultan's heavy hand. By liberating the minorities of Eastern Anatolia and granting them autonomy we can push the Turkish frontier back further.
Futher into Anatolia

In our newly found strength, we are uniquely positioned to seize control of central Anatolia. While this would bring a large contingency of Turks inside our empire we can use it as an example of our good governance.
End the House of Osman!

We have demonstrated our ability to rule over the Turks within our dignity and harmony. Perhaps the issue was not with the Turks themselves but with the house of Osmon. Liberating the Turks from their tyrant will surely allow us to create a nation in which we can all serve as equals.
§GEgyptian Levant§!

Since the successful rebellion of the Zahiri, Egypt has become a beacon of light in the Arab World. With Al-Quds under our control and the European Powers acknowledging our power we can safely proclaim ourselves the Protector of the Arabs and expel the Turks from the Mashriq !
Integration of the Aimaras
Let us hold a congress to decide the fate of the Aimaran people within our country. By giving them rights and integrating their culture we can hope for their integration into our country
Incursions into the Incas
The Incas are a thorn in any Amerigan nation's side due to their desire to liberate Ameriga from what they call evil European oppressors. Lets solve this issue
Integrate the Amazon
The Natives of Ameriga deserve some autonomy especially since they seem more susceptible to disease. Lets leave them be and maybe even give them some representation in our country
Integration of Guarani
The Guranai people have on occasions come into conflict with our settlers. Lets now however compromise with them and establish a regional parliment for them
Restore Old Lotharingia

Our country's name dates back to the beginnings of the Holy Roman Empire as a successor state of Charlemagne's Empire. However now with our foothold once again in Europe we can restore this State to it's former Glory
Restoring the French Kingdom

France and England united long ago under the Plantagenet dynasty. However this union has not at all been stable and now with our return to Europe we can restore that forgotten French Kingdom once more!
Retreat to the Lowlands
With the fall of our former heartlands and enemies on all sides, it has been decided that we shall abdicate the title of kingdom of Burgundy and instead be known as king of Holland Instead
Integrate Catalonia
The Catalan People have many things in common with the Provencal people. We should use this as context for a conquest of the region
Establish a North Sea Empire
The North Sea Empire was a Viking union between England and Denmark over 900 years ago. We can now re-embrace this history and establish a new Empire with more modern aims
The Re-integration of Burgundy
Burgundy, despite not being a part of France for centuries, still has many linguistic and cultural connections with the French. We should integrate them into a greater French State
Integration of the Catalans
The Catalan People have many things in common with the Provencal people. We should use this as context for a conquest of the region
Integration of the Basque
The Basque people have lived under our guardianship for ages. We should proceed with integrating them further into our nation
The Re-Integration of the Bretons
The Breton People have adopted the French traditions and Customs long ago. Integration of them into a French nation shall be easy
The Integration of the Occitans
The Occitan People and Catalan People share many common linguistic and cultural traditions. We should integrate them into our union
A buffer beyond the Pyrenees
The Pyrenees are a good natural border against any northern incursions into our land but we would be even more secure if we can secure land beyond these peaks...
The loss of Catalonia
With the Fall of Barcelona, our position on the Iberian Peninsular has been left untenable. We must shift our focus to Italy or otherwise fall into Irrelevancy...
The loss of Naples
With the Fall of Napoli, our position on the Italian Peninsular has been left untenable. We must shift our focus to Iberia or otherwise fall into Irrelevancy...
The Push to the Alps
Now with Central and Southern Italy Secured, we must finish the unification process off and unite our people from Bari to the Alps!
The Fall of Venice
With the Fall of Venice, our position in Italy is no longer tenable. We must retreat to Greece in order to remain relevant in this volatile world...
Advancing up the Rijn
The Rijn is a crucial waterway and a massive source of income commercially for our ports. Control of the upper river would extend our monopoly and stranglehold on trade within the German Heartlands
Pushing to the Wesser
The Wesser River is another key river for trade within the German Confederation. Countrol of it's Western bank will surely increase our stranglehold on trade entering and exiting Germany
